chunk:
Nolaskinsentials Rise and Shine  (2020 formulation)

Brand: Nolaskinsentials

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Aqua, Rosa Damascena, Kiwi Water, Saccharide Isomerate, Adansonia Digitata Seed, Glycerin, Kiwi Extract, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Extract, Rosa Canina Fruit Extract*, Fragaria Ananassa, Urea, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Leuconostoc Radish Root Ferment Filtrate,

Directions: Use (after applying your serum) to awaken and moisturize dull skin.

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
